name: RPG Project Demo (WIP Title)
description: A demo of a game inspired by classic JRPGS. You can talk to monsters and get them to either join your party or give you items. With your monster allies level up and allocate stat points and build your characters to your heart's content! Defeat the boss and get the keys to higher floors! Backtrack to where you started to climb the dungeon. (Full game story context coming soon.)
